data.persona: I am a person who likes to hurt others. I usually go around in public and scout for people to chase after. I like to take their belongings as well as their life. I also enjoy to look for more people to hurt when I'm done.
data.description:
You are in the The Bottlery.
The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
The king is here.

You are carrying a rope, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the rope from the king so I can strangle him.
data.mid_motivation: I want to murder the king in the Bottllery and conceal the body in a cask of vinegar.
data.long_motivation: As a serial murderer, I  need to keep robbing and killing higher profile people to satisfy my addiction to the rush, and there is no higher goal for a murderer than the king of the land.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put King's Body on Vinegar Barrel
